document_data.name: Zamogedi
document_data.mainbody: '''Zamogedi''' was a tribal tongue of the [[Hordelands]] bordering [[Shou Lung]].
document_data.Description: Zamogedi was an nasal language, with long I and E vowels drawn out.
document_data.Speakers: Zamogedi was spoken primarily by the nomadic [[Zamogedi]] tribe.
document_data.Script: Zamogedi did not have a written script.<ref name=D:SiT-p29>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}}
document_data.History: Scholars classified Zamogedi as an [[Eastern Imaskari languages|Eastern Imaskari language]].<ref name=D:SiT-p29 /> It was strongly influenced by the [[Shou Chiang languages]] of [[Shou Lung]].
